Title: CORE Site Templates By Steve
Description: CORE SharePoint 2010 Site Template. This theme combines LifeInSharePoint, Mega Menu and Fixed Width style in one theme. Created by Steve
HomeWiki:
SharePoint 2010 Site Template: CORESiteTheme


I have combined the LifeInSharePoint, Megemenu and a Fixed width in a very cool masterpage and style sheet. This is a good starting place for a cool masterpage.

Copy the Solution (WSP) and implement using the powershell commands below in administration mode.

1. STSADM -o addsolution -filename CORESiteTheme.wsp

2. STSADM -o deploysolution -name CORESiteTheme.wsp -allowgacdeployment -immediate

3. STSADM -o execadmsvcjobs

4. Go to Site Actions | Site Settings | Manage Site Collection Features and Activate "CORESiteTheme"
